description: Are you at a pub and want to show your love for Ireland? Or are you in the mood to sing your national anthem? Then this app is for you! Just start it up and the waving flag of Ireland is displayed while an instrumental version (beautifully performed, no midi!) of the national anthem is playing. Right now this app is only released in Ireland but will soon be released world-wide. So let's make sure the other countries see a good rating behind your country's app!
